explains: n. 会费；手续费；税捐（due 的复数）
wordGroup: due out 待发；待退；应离店但还未离店

sentences.en: The offering was flour, oil, and incense. Part of the incense was taken away as the priest's dues, and the rest was burned in the altar.
sentences.cn: 祭品是面粉、油和香，这香的一部分被掰去，作为祭司的会费，剩下的部分摆在祭坛里燃烧。

sentences.en: As she neared the end of her prison sentence, a well-known columnist wrote that she was "paying her dues," and that "there is simply no reason for anyone to attempt to deny her right to start anew."
sentences.cn: 当她的刑期接近尾声时，一位著名的专栏作家写道，她正在“付出自己的代价”，“任何人都没有资格否定她重新开始的权利”。

sentences.en: He went round the various offices to collect the dues.
sentences.cn: 他到各个办公室去收会费。
